function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases propagation in the built environment","Impact":"Potential spread of diseases among occupants of the built environment","Mitigation":"Implementing measures for infection control and prevention","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UV disinfection, antimicrobial surfaces","People":"Occupants, visitors, workers in the built environment","Owner":"Building managers, facility owners, public health authorities"}]}
